Song.Title: LUV
Song.Lyrics:
Gieok hanayo
Uri hamkke haetdeon sigan L.O.V.E love
Seollenayo
Hant tean modeun geosieotdeon L.O.V.E love
Ijeneun gakkeum saenggagnaneun
Geuttaen L.O.V.E love
Siganeul doeldolli suneun eobtnayo
Mideul suga eobseo
Hanjam jina beorin uri yaegi

(My love) Yunanhi jichigo gireosseotdeon harue
(My love) Nae pyeoneun hanado eobtjyo
(L.O.V.E love) Jamsirado nugungaege gidaeeoseo ulgo sipjyo
Neowa na duryeopjiga anhdeon geu sigan
Seoro soneul jameul ttaemyeon
Neo hana neoman nae yeope isseo jumyeon
Amugeotdo pilyo eobtdeon geunareul

Gieok hanayo
Uri hamkke haetdeon sigan L.O.V.E love
Seollenayo
Hant tean modeun geosieotdeon L.O.V.E love
Ijeneun gakkeum saenggagnaneun
Geuttaen L.O.V.E love
Siganeul doeldolli suneun eobtnayo
Mideul suga eobseo
Hanjam jina beorin uri yaegi

(My love) su eobsi majuchineun saramdeul sogeseo
(My love) jeomjeom itchyeogagetjyo
(L.O .V.E love) geuraedo gakkeum geuttaen saengagen
Yeojeonhi useumman najyo
Neowa na neomu haengbokhaetdeon geu sigan
Seororeul maju bol ttaemyeon
Neo hana neoman nareul mideo jundamyeon
Sesang gajang himi dwaetdeon geudaega nal

Gieok hanayo
Uri hamkke haetdeon sigan L.O.V.E love
Seollenayo
Hant tean modeun geosieotdeon L.O.V.E love
Ijeneun gakkeum saenggagnaneun
Geuttaen L.O.V.E love
Siganeul doeldolli suneun eobtnayo
Mideul suga eobseo
Hanjam jina beorin uri yaegi

(Neon nal) geuriwohanayo
(Neon nal) geuriwohanayo
(Nan neol) geuriwohago itjyo
Neon naui gieok soge chueok eodinga
Geureohge namaitjyo

Gieok hanayo
Uri hamkke haetdeon sigan L.O.V.E love
Seollenayo
Hant tean modeun geosieotdeon L.O.V.E love
Ijeneun gakkeum saenggagnaneun
Geuttaen L.O.V.E love
Siganeul doeldolli suneun eobtnayo
Mideul suga eobseo
Hanjam jina beorin uri yaegi
